title: PorTrend OreTrend 6/2: Michael Avenatti, Jack Harlow, Queen Elizabeth, Shooting Epidemic, Laura Ingraham, Elvis
itunes:title: PorTrend OreTrend 6/2: Michael Avenatti, Jack Harlow, Queen Elizabeth, Shooting Epidemic, Laura Ingraham, Elvis
description:
In this edition of PorTrend OreTrend, Miles and super producer Becca discuss Michael Avenatti getting 4 years for defrauding Stormy Daniels, KFC's Jack Harlow meal, Queen Elizabeth not going to her own Jubilee, myriad shootings EVERYWHERE, Laura Ingram getting in her "Reefer Madness" bag, and Elvis' estate issuing C&D to Vegas wedding chapels.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
